name: granny hood
sizes_available: 30x39cm/12x15.5” width x length, or follow instructions in notes for customized size
notes:
easy crochet pattern of granny hood.
this stylish hood is made of two classic granny squares. easily customizable
in terms of colorway and size, you can make one for yourself and each one
of your friends just using up your yarn stash. a quick and rewarding project
to enlighten the grey and windy season in style.

great stash busting project, you can use almost any yarn you have, and even very small amounts of them.

finished size: 30x39cm/12x15.5” width x length to fit most adult heads, with instructions on how to easily customize size for any head circumference.

skills needed (us terms):
single crochet
single crochet in back loop only
double crochet
crocheting in rounds
crocheting in rows

pattern is written in us terms, in english only.
